title: Manage an IP Portfolio
description: An IP paralegal needs to review a client's trademark portfolio to identify upcoming renewal deadlines.

tasks.description: Access the client's IP portfolio in the management software.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the list of all trademarks.

tasks.description: Filter the portfolio to show all trademarks with a renewal deadline in the next 6 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of upcoming deadlines.

tasks.description: Create a report of the upcoming deadlines for the supervising attorney and the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a clear report to ensure no deadlines are missed.
